com.nulabinc.backlog4j.api

Interface WikiMethods

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BacklogClient
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BacklogClientImpl

    public interface WikiMethods
    Executes Backlog Wiki APIs.
